vclaim: Emma Breier, the daughter of an American diplomat, was used as a "crisis actor" for U.S. President Donald Trump's hospital visit after the Dayton mass shooting in August 2019.
title: Did Trump Pose with ‘Crisis Actor’ Emma Breier After Dayton Shooting?
subtitle: Doppelgangers definitely provide ample fodder for conspiracy theorists.
author: Dan Evon
